name: CreateGithubTeam
description:
Create a new team in a GitHub organization.

Use this tool to create a new team within a specified GitHub organization. The authenticated user must be a member or owner of the organization. Upon creation, the user becomes a team maintainer by default.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The case-insensitive name of the GitHub organization where the team will be created.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: team_name
parameters.description: The name of the team to be created. It should be a string.

parameters.name: team_description
parameters.description: A brief description of the team being created. This helps specify the team's purpose or role within the organization.

parameters.name: ldap_distinguished_name
parameters.description: The distinguished name (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team. Ensure LDAP synchronization is enabled.

value_schema.description: The [distinguished name](https://www.ldap.com/ldap-dns-and-rdns) (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team. LDAP synchronization must be enabled to map LDAP entries to a team. Use the "[Update LDAP mapping for a team](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/enterprise-admin#update-ldap-mapping-for-a-team)" endpoint to change the LDAP DN. For more information, see "[Using LDAP](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/admin/identity-and-access-management/authenticating-users-for-your-github-enterprise-server-instance/using-ldap#enabling-ldap-sync)."

parameters.name: team_maintainers_github_ids
parameters.description: List of GitHub IDs for organization members who will become team maintainers.

value_schema.description: List GitHub IDs for organization members who will become team maintainers.

parameters.name: parent_team_id
parameters.description: The numerical ID of the team to assign as the parent for the new team.

value_schema.description: The ID of a team to set as the parent team.

parameters.name: deprecated_repository_permission
parameters.description: Specifies the permission for new repositories, though it is deprecated. Options are `pull` or `push`.

value_schema.description: **Deprecated**. The permission that new repositories will be added to the team with when none is specified.

parameters.name: team_privacy_level
parameters.description: Specifies if the team is 'secret' or 'closed'. Defaults: 'secret' for non-nested teams, 'closed' for parent/child teams.

value_schema.description:
The level of privacy this team should have. The options are:  
**For a non-nested team:**  
 * `secret` - only visible to organization owners and members of this team.  
 * `closed` - visible to all members of this organization.  
Default: `secret`  
**For a parent or child team:**  
 * `closed` - visible to all members of this organization.  
Default for child team: `closed`

parameters.name: repository_names_to_add_to_team
parameters.description: Array of full repository names (e.g., "organization-name/repository-name") to associate with the team.

value_schema.description: The full name (e.g., "organization-name/repository-name") of repositories to add the team to.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: ldap_dn
parameters.description: The [distinguished name](https://www.ldap.com/ldap-dns-and-rdns) (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team. LDAP synchronization must be enabled to map LDAP entries to a team. Use the "[Update LDAP mapping for a team](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/enterprise-admin#update-ldap-mapping-for-a-team)" endpoint to change the LDAP DN. For more information, see "[Using LDAP](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/admin/identity-and-access-management/authenticating-users-for-your-github-enterprise-server-instance/using-ldap#enabling-ldap-sync)."

value_schema.description: The [distinguished name](https://www.ldap.com/ldap-dns-and-rdns) (DN) of the LDAP entry to map to a team. LDAP synchronization must be enabled to map LDAP entries to a team. Use the "[Update LDAP mapping for a team](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/enterprise-admin#update-ldap-mapping-for-a-team)" endpoint to change the LDAP DN. For more information, see "[Using LDAP](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/admin/identity-and-access-management/authenticating-users-for-your-github-enterprise-server-instance/using-ldap#enabling-ldap-sync)."

parameters.name: maintainers
parameters.description: List GitHub IDs for organization members who will become team maintainers.

value_schema.description: List GitHub IDs for organization members who will become team maintainers.

parameters.name: parent_team_id
parameters.description: The ID of a team to set as the parent team.

value_schema.description: The ID of a team to set as the parent team.

parameters.name: permission
parameters.description: **Deprecated**. The permission that new repositories will be added to the team with when none is specified.

value_schema.description: **Deprecated**. The permission that new repositories will be added to the team with when none is specified.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description:
The level of privacy this team should have. The options are:  
**For a non-nested team:**  
 * `secret` - only visible to organization owners and members of this team.  
 * `closed` - visible to all members of this organization.  
Default: `secret`  
**For a parent or child team:**  
 * `closed` - visible to all members of this organization.  
Default for child team: `closed`

value_schema.description:
The level of privacy this team should have. The options are:  
**For a non-nested team:**  
 * `secret` - only visible to organization owners and members of this team.  
 * `closed` - visible to all members of this organization.  
Default: `secret`  
**For a parent or child team:**  
 * `closed` - visible to all members of this organization.  
Default for child team: `closed`

parameters.name: repo_names
parameters.description: The full name (e.g., "organization-name/repository-name") of repositories to add the team to.

value_schema.description: The full name (e.g., "organization-name/repository-name") of repositories to add the team to.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
